name: no changes (calibration unknown)
description: Instrument visited but calibration could not be carried out

name: no changes (in calibration)
description: Instrument verified and found to be in calibration; no changes to calibration function

name: no changes (out of calibration)
description: Instrument checked and found to be out of calibration; no changes to calibration function

name: recalibrated (in calibration)
description: Instrument checked and found to be out of calibration; instrument recalibrated (calibration function changed)

name: inapplicable
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of this particular observation
